information.name: pacman
information.description: This plugin allows using Mikrotik as a packet manager
information.author: Shaun Wilkinson

configuration.label: Packet Manager IP
configuration.description: The IP address of your RouterOS packet manager.

configuration.label: Packet Manager Admin User
configuration.description: Username for the UCRM to write to the packet manager.

configuration.label: Packet Manager API Port
configuration.description: Port used to access RouterOS API if different from 8728.

configuration.label: Second Packet Manager IP
configuration.description: IP address of second RouterOS packet manager (if applicable).

configuration.label: Second Packet Manager Admin User
configuration.description: Username for the UCRM to write to the second packet manager (if applicable).

configuration.label: Second Packet Manager API Port
configuration.description: Port used to access RouterOS API if different from 8728.
